No. 253812)} Sub: Amendment in Schedule H of the Model EPC Contract Agreement reg: MoRTH vide its letter No. F No: COVID-19/RoadMap/JS(H)/2020 dated 11.10.2024 has issued amendments in the Schedule-H of Model EPC Contract Agreement: 2. The amended Schedule-H is annexed with the aforesaid MoRTH letter dated 11.10.2024. A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation. 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above 2[1el4 (CS.
